Line1.FB4C3: I shan’t complain, save one ingredient: gutweed. It’s a plant the Drowned eat. Nothing like it for delaying necrosis. I don’t know who discovered this, but it becomes more potent when partly digested by Drowned.
Line3.FB4C3: (chuckles) I made the same face when I first heard it too. I recommend wearing gloves.
